text.div:
Release Date: 2016-11-11

Level Code Display Definition
1 normal normal The 'typical' state. Excludes "nullified" which represents the termination state of a participation instance that was created in error.
2   active active The state representing the fact that the Participation is in progress.
2   cancelled cancelled The terminal state resulting from cancellation of the Participation prior to activation.
2   completed completed The terminal state representing the successful completion of the Participation.
2   pending pending The state representing that fact that the Participation has not yet become active.
1 nullified nullified The state representing the termination of a Participation instance that was created in error.

name: v3 Code System ManagedParticipationStatus
description: Codes representing the defined possible states of a Managed Participation, as defined by the Managed Participation class state machine.

concept.definition: The 'typical' state. Excludes "nullified" which represents the termination state of a participation instance that was created in error.
The state representing the fact that the Participation is in progress.
The terminal state resulting from cancellation of the Participation prior to activation.
The terminal state representing the successful completion of the Participation.
The state representing that fact that the Participation has not yet become active.
The state representing the termination of a Participation instance that was created in error.
